intro: Rhodiola yunnanensis var. valerianoides, commonly known as the Yunnan rhodiola, is a perennial herb native to the high-altitude regions of China. Rhodiola yunnanensis var. valerianoides is valued for its adaptogenic properties and is often used in traditional medicine.
